column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Ramen purists rejoice
column2: JINYA IS AS LEGIT AS IT GETS! Stopped in on a Sunday afternoon for lunch and ordered the Chachacha (for Garlic Lovers) rich flavorful broth
column4: an adequate portion of chasiu and a whole softboiled egg! Another great highlight of this restaurant is it's unique decor and large communal table
column5: with a perfect view of the kitchen. Highly recommend this place for those looking to satisfy a hearty ramen craving without the worry of disappointment.
